tool_description:
A low-cost, high quality dictionary. With synonyms, antonyms, parts of speech, usage in a sentence. Supporting most languages. Used by several popular apps on the App Store!

Brought to you by the language experts at JSpell.

*Cold boot on new demo API requests. Be patient. Thanks!
name: Dictionary
title: Dictionary

api_list.name: /wait_define
api_list.description: Fetches the definition, part of speech, and usage in a sentence for a given word.

required_parameters.name: word
required_parameters.description: The word to fetch the definition for.
